activities:
Bravesoft provides a range of services for Remote Database Administration, 
Oracle Database Administration, Oracle Consulting, and Project Management 
Consulting.  Provision of these services may entail accessing our clients' 
databases which may have personally identifiable information of EU data 
subjects.
